comment.body:
I fixed it!  Had to de-install & reinstall.
    On Thursday, August 15, 2024 at 09:17:18 AM CDT, Alex ***@***.***> wrote:   

 


@trixie2787 Hi. Cannot reproduce. Did you try to reboot or restart AdGuard and browser?
Is AdGuard detected on https://adguard.com/test.html ?

—
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub, or unsubscribe.
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.Message ID: ***@***.***>

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.tumblr.com/dashboard](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.tumblr.com%2Fdashboard) ### Comment > trying to login causes the page https://www.tumblr.com/privacy/consent/begin?v=2&redirect=%2Fdashboard to be loaded, I suspect this is caused by some cookie banner ### Screenshots

Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/8wrchprykzcwwwkg8wg0ws8oo0cgw881efrwwf8gpd.png?nc=1)
